query:
SELECT 
  c.id as conversation_id,
  c.themeId as current_theme,
  c.initialProblem,
  c.createdAt,
  (SELECT content FROM messages WHERE conversationId = c.id AND role = 'user' ORDER BY createdAt LIMIT 1) as first_message
FROM conversations c
ORDER BY c.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 50;
